video.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives Collection
video.synopsis: Guy Fieri takes a cross-country road trip to visit some of America's classic "greasy spoon" restaurants that have been doing it right for decades.

episodes.synopsis: Guy hits the road with Matthew McConaughey and Andrew Zimmern to sample dishes at their hometown hangouts in Texas and Minnesota, respectively.
episodes.title: Triple D All Stars

episodes.synopsis: Unique chow is served up in Stillwater, Minnesota, at Guy's own restaurant in Santa Rosa, California, and at a hot-dog joint in Portsmouth, Virginia.
episodes.title: Unexpected Eats

episodes.synopsis: Guy tucks in his napkin and chows down on meat when he visits a barbecue stand in Dallas that serves beef brisket and Carolina pork.
episodes.title: BBQ Road Show

episodes.synopsis: Guy enjoys gourmet grub in Chicago at a brewhouse serving up beer to go with mussels, a mega brisket sandwich and their version of headcheese.
episodes.title: Belly Up

episodes.synopsis: On Oahu's coast, Guy samples traditional Hawaiian dishes, like laulau stew; an underground café in Mississippi goes bananas with French toast.
episodes.title: Unconvential Comforts

episodes.synopsis: Guy revels in the fantastic flavors of Hawaii, Baltimore and Memphis, where he samples duck fried rice and Jack Daniels bread pudding.
episodes.title: Flavortown Medley

episodes.synopsis: Guy feasts at a St. Louis eatery famed for its duck and cheese fries and visits New England, where he digs into clamcakes fried in beef fat.
episodes.title: Food Done Right

episodes.synopsis: Guy's explores new takes on traditional recipes, tasting dishes like chile verde with pork, mac-and-cheese with lobster and Reuben fritters.
episodes.title: Turn On Tradtional

episodes.synopsis: Guy Fieri travels to St. Louis and Syracuse, finding real-deal authentic eats in unusual spots along the way, from Cajun potstickers to baklava.
episodes.title: Authentic Eats

episodes.synopsis: In Brooklyn, Guy nibbles on unique barbecued wings and big-time beef ribs; a North Carolina couple dishes up soft-shell crab quesadillas.
episodes.title: Matches Made in Heaven

episodes.synopsis: In Kitty Hawk, Guy samples a fisherman's risotto by the sea; an Olympia brewpub serves beer with bangers and mash and crab-stuffed cannelloni.
episodes.title: Land to Sea

episodes.synopsis: In Toronto, an old-school Jewish deli smokes meats and and makes knishes; an LA food truck infuses crab cakes and burgers with Singapore's flavors.
episodes.title: Real Deal Roots

episodes.synopsis: In Phoenix, a tattooed chef puts her spin on chiles and a regional pork dish; an old, bohemian Toronto joint serves up sticky Asian pork ribs.
episodes.title: Peppers, Pork and Poutine

episodes.synopsis: In Compton, a barbecue joint puts smoked turkey necks in the collard greens; a Denver eatery whips up a unique bowl of mac-and-cheese.
episodes.title: Kings and Queens of 'Cue

episodes.synopsis: In Philadelphia, a Jamaican joint goes all out with jerk chicken; in Scottsdale, Guy savors sandwiches; in Denver, rabbit and chitlings are served.
episodes.title: Timeless Traditions

episodes.synopsis: Guy eats a mishmash of comfort foods, from North African chicken in Philadelphia, to organic tacos in Leucadia, to mac-and-cheese muffins in Phoenix.
episodes.title: From Pound Cake to Pot Pie

episodes.synopsis: In Carlsbad, an Italian joint stays true to family recipes; an Oregon tavern offers killer sloppy joes; in San Francisco, Guy gobbles real Mexican.
episodes.title: From the Heart

episodes.synopsis: In San Francisco, a Venezuelan joint offers a gluten-free menu; in Portland, a sausage spot serves meats like Italian red wine dry-cured salami.
episodes.title: That's Fresh

episodes.synopsis: In San Diego, a breakfast joint serves up crème brûlée French toast; in Portland, a couple offers Americana, like corned beef hash.
episodes.title: Neighborhood Knockouts

episodes.synopsis: In Portland, a family joint features a chef who butchers, cures, preserves and smokes everything in house, from headcheese to fried chicken.
episodes.title: Meat Lover's Paradise

episodes.synopsis: In Santa Fe, a Chimayan chef turns out enchiladas with red chile sauce and chile; in Portland, a noodle house cranks out authentic Chinese fare.
episodes.title: Aces of Authenticity

episodes.synopsis: In Santa Fe, a café with a native Kenyan in the kitchen plates up totally fresh fish; in Albuquerque, a school lunch maven serves creative sammies.
episodes.title: Sammies and Stew

episodes.synopsis: Guy visits eateries that offer soulful comfort foods, like a heartless artichoke sandwich, a spicy lentil dish and barbecue with a side of the blues.
episodes.title: Comfort and Soul

episodes.synopsis: Guy heads south of the border to Cabo San Lucas, Mexico, and munches on fresh octopus tacos and Guadalajaran-inspired sauces.
episodes.title: South of the Border

episodes.synopsis: In Nashville, a husband and wife take to the streets in their gourmet food truck; in Missouri, a sibling-owned Chinese joint shares family traditions.
episodes.title: Family Time
